website_summaries.verdict: With top-notch ingredients, multiple appealing flavors, and excellent mixability, it's hard to go wrong with this popular casein protein powder.
pros: Micellar casein delivers a steady stream of BCAAs to muscles for up to eight hours, promoting recovery and growth even while you sleep
Delivers 24g of protein in exchange for only 120 calories
Enhanced with Aminogen to aid protein digestion and absorption
Available in a wide range of appealing flavors

customer_reviews.title: He said it tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am supplementing the protein for my 96 yo husband - I was thrilled to find it in strawberry. I added this to his Boost and he said it was delicious! I only used 1 TBL which is 1/3 the suggested portion but I wanted to start slowly in case it is powdery. However, no remaining residue and I only stirred it! I am trying to help him maintain his muscle mass as the elderly lose it very quickly. I intend to up it to a full portion after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: love my pets

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with contaminants
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of my increased protein diet (part of a new workout regimen) and after a week of taking it, I had the *worst* digestive issues I've ever had. I do have lactose issues, but I can eat diary that's lactose free with no issues, and whey protein supplements have been fine. After doing some research, I found that this particular product is loaded with industrial toxins (see the clean label project, where this was one of the worst scoring products on there). I'll be throwing this out, and certainly not buying again (and I'll be steering clear of this brand in the future since their other products have variable results wrt contamination).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein!
customer_reviews.text: This Casein protein product is great! It does its job perfectly. I take this before I sleep to provide my body with the nutrients at night. The first day I took this, I woke up feeling more energized, and more awake. The Casein protein does it's job and I am very impressed. Tastes great and is pretty easy to mix! However, just keep in mind to not mix it with milk. I tried to mix it with almond milk once, and it started to thicken as it reacted to the acid within it. Remember, that the Casein powder reacts with your stomach acid to create a slow releasing protein.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Case in point for Casein!
customer_reviews.text: Don't eat after 9? Why you ask? You'll turn into a gremlin! I jest. In my case, Casein protein and Whey protein was primarily consumed after strength training in the morning. You can consume Casein specifically prior to bed. You won't sleep hungry and your body will not catabolize on your muscles from the workout. As they say in the bodybuilding community, "you won't lose your gainz!" Preferred choice of liquid is Almond Milk. Whole Milk is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Supreme flavor
customer_reviews.text: My main gripe is that this does not mix well, no matter what the flavoring is. Regarding Chocolate Supreme flavor in particular: the second listed ingredient is cocoa. If you can't take caffeine in the evening, you might want to stay away from this flavoring for the same reason. I'm guessing it's the caffeine-like effect of theobromine in the cocoa. Have no problem using the same product in vanilla flavor as a bedtime drink. Morning and daytime—no issues except the mixing problem.
customer_reviews.author: sblightning

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended product. Previously I was eating cottage cheese before going to sleep but it was not so tasty as Casein. Also I use each time two cups of casein so it gives me 50g protein for a night which is much more than I can get from cottage cheese. Love the taste and result. Already ordered my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: Gold Standard is by far the most beneficial protein powder for my needs. It provides the most protein per calorie, and is great for people exercising to lose weight. I previously used the whey powder, but even a double dose left me hungry. The casein powder is thick and fills me up with just one scoop. If i drink one for breakfast, I'm not hungry for about 6 hours. So far, I have tried the chocolate peanut butter and cookies and cream. Both taste great and mix well with unsweetened unflavored almond milk. The only thing to consider is that you will need a blender bottle or something similar to fully mix this.
customer_reviews.author: Haystack

customer_reviews.title: Great product from ON.
customer_reviews.text: Great product from ON. I have seen reviews complaining about the consistency and chunks... this ie Casein protein.. it becomes a gel in your stomach for slow consumption while you sleep. I find that if you pour the water/milk FIRST, then dump the scoop in the cup and shake it well, you are good. However. If you throw the powder first then the water/milk, it has a tendency for a good portion to solidify in the bottom of the cup/shaker. Tastes great but that is really a personal preference at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Good protein by unneeded food coloring.
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of chocolate mint. This casein is delicious! But why the food coloring? If anything the greenish blue food coloring made the drink look nasty. Lose the food coloring, we aren't children.
customer_reviews.author: ttsai

customer_reviews.title: Scam Product ... Bad imitation
customer_reviews.text: Scam product I was really surprised when the outer seal broke easily when I just pulled it out with my fingers, a quality that I know is not possible for any authentic ON products. When I opend the lid there was no seal on the top of the package. I know it says do not consume the product if the seal is broken. I believe this is not authentic product with stupid imitation. I am extremely furious that I will take further steps especially when I noticed the large number of people who bought this before me.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, but
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the chocolate supreme. It has a great taste. What clumps there are when mixing in a blender bottle can shake out if allowed to soften. After 4 servings (1 a day) I unfortunately found I am intolerant of casein. Lot of bathroom time and gas. If you're unsure, you may want to purchase a smaller container first, unlike the 4lb that I did.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: solid choice of casein supplement
customer_reviews.text: A solid choice for casein protein. It's a little pricey but ON is generally rated well by labs. ON protein powders tend to have pretty good flavors. I'd rate the chocolate supreme casein a 7.5 out of 10. Chocolate supreme is also one of the lower-carbohydrate powders in comparison to the other flavors (although ON generally keeps the carb count low in their protein powders anyway). It mixed well and is easy on the stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M. Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for longer than I should have because it caused scalp acne. It took me a while to figure out what part of my diet was causing the acne. When I stopped using this protein powder the acne went away. I would mix it with bananas and kale or spinach leaves and ice and water. At first, I thought maybe the bananas were causing the acne but it definitely turns out to be this protein powder. Everyone has different triggers that cause acne so my experience may be different than someone else's.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scurto

customer_reviews.title: Double Chocolate has a better taste and is more versatile for shakes or a quick protein drink
customer_reviews.text: Casein Protein Powder has several thicken ingredients that add absolutely no value to the product. For me there seems to be a lot of wasted powder, since it does not mix well. If you are purchasing you will need to pull out the hand blender every time to get a drink that isn't lumpy, even with water. Double Chocolate Whey can be used with almond milk or water, add a banana etc. Quick drink and tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Tar Heel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Most people dont like casein...too thick, tough to mix. My trick....about 10 oz of water in my shaker bottle, then my casein, then more water. Use a spoon or a handheld egg beater, then shake it. I've had the vanilla and chocolate peanut butter. Both taste great and mix fine with water
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate and chocolate peanut butter flavors are outstanding, and the vanilla is pretty good as well, though a little bland. I've used 15 pounds of this powder in the last 6 months. I stopped using it after reading the independent laboratory testing conducted at the behest of the Clean Label Project, however.
customer_reviews.author: HCC3

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Casein Ice Cream that you can eat at night!?!?  Mmmmm.....
customer_reviews.text: I needed a healthier solution to snacking at night, so drinking casein was the solution told to me by a physical trainer. It really helps a lot because it fills me up and I don't have the late night craving anymore. I've tried a couple flavors of casein and this one is my favorite. I mixed it with water, Almond Milk, and Lactose Free Milk. Almond Milk was the best tasting mix of the three to me. I usually mix it all together then stick it in the freezer for a while to simulate a C/PB Ice Cream Shake. One solution was to blend it with some ice cubes. I tried it and it was pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian DC

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely discount quality.... does the job for the budget concious
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly believe the product does what it is supposed to do - just that the consistency and taste could really be better. Despite my best efforts in a blender bottle it always ends up gritty and not really mixed well. I have to put it in a blender to really get it mixed up well, and even then it is still a really weird consistency. The chocolate taste is about the same as any other casein at this price point - cheap tasting. I will finish off the tub but probably going to switch back to the GNC AMP Wheybolic - it seems to be worth spending the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Good product for your money
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a pretty good product and if you’re looking for Casein then it’s not a bad option for your money. PROS: • Good flavor. I would mix this at night with almond milk, spinach, ice and peanut butter before I went to bed. The flavor was great. • Good ingredient quality. I’ve done a lot of research on protein and supplements and Optimum Nutrition is highly recommended for their ingredient quality. CONS: • Mixes horribly. I can’t say that it’s strictly this product only, but probably casein in general. Either way just as a heads up, it won’t mix very well if you’re expecting consistency like a regular protein shake.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this protein powder, it is not chalky like other brands. I got the strawberry and cream flavor which was okay but I would have enjoyed the plain strawberry flavor I believe. I got the strawberry cream after reading a review saying it tasted like a strawberry milkshake. To me it tastes more like strawberry cheesecake. I despise cheesecake and when I put this in strawberry smoothies I can taste the cream flavor coming through. The protein powder mixes fairly well and I like adding it to yogurt, smoothies, and drinking it with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Megan ChicosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No internal seal, taste is non existent
customer_reviews.text: I am actually returning this product. There was an external seal on the lid but no internal which I do not like. I tried one shake of this (choc pb) and won't be trying it again as the taste is practically non existent and almost cardboard like. Not even a hint of peanut butter. I will be going back to my UMP (Beverly) protein. If you're looking for one that's easily digestible, try theirs, as I always had problems digesting protein powder until I got it. Was trying to find other options but none have lived up to theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality controls
customer_reviews.text: Lid of product was cracked and not due to delivery services cause package was not damaged. Update: since the lid was cracked product was all on the inside of the package and after I opened the seal looks like half is missing. I am fearful of tampering possibilities. Either way like I said must have been cracked prior to boxing and shipping. Can’t understand how seller still boxed product and shipped it to me like this.
customer_reviews.author: Aireal

customer_reviews.title: Creamy Vanilla taste is spot on!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Tried it when it came in. Has a sweet cream flavor like a vanilla coffee creamer. I add the first scoop to my morning coffee and blend it in my Ninja. Tastes like a vanilla latte. Add almond milk to it and blend for lunch each day. 5 stars for taste and how well it blends!! (If you don't like a vanilla that's on the slightly sweeter side then this isn't for you). Normally I don't like powders but this one I will have on auto ship!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cookie dough, far from it......
customer_reviews.text: Have bought other flavors of this same product before and they have tasted great. This cookie dough is by far the worst tasting protein shake I have ever had. Very bitter and but bland at the same time with horrible aftertaste. Going to be a long three weeks with this flavor. Stick with the traditional flavors or cookies and cream if you want to change it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cookie dough flavor is awful and smells terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly will be sticking to Dymatize instead from now on. Got the Peanut Butter and Cookie dough flavors. The PB is ok, not great, and not as good as the brand we are use too. The Cookie Dough flavor just smells aweful and tastes just as bad. Wtf it doesn't even smell like cookies. It smells like plastic or poison or something. Maybe I just got a bad batch but between both flavors and large containers we got I think we will be staying away from this brand for Casein at least. Dymatize rich chocolate is much better imo
customer_reviews.author: Tallanasty

customer_reviews.title: A plus in anyone stacks
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and tasted very good. For me, I’m very picky about the flavor of anything I drink because I don’t want to spend my money on crappy tasting supplements and it must be good when I rated 5 stars. For beginners I would recommend this and a bottle of whey protein, bag of creative monohydrate and this casein, you’ll be supprise how your body change. I bought the mint chocolate chips and yep it taste like what its sound like! High quality and very effective to use at night, for me I use it 1 hour prior bedtime snack some fruits or cereal (sometimes) with it at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Khoa Tran

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bad bad bad protein. Does not mix well at all even in a blender. Chunks are HUGE and taste is not good at all. Don’t waste your money on this casein powder, although I would recommend a lot of gold standards products though. But not this Casein.
customer_reviews.author: russel

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients, effective when used properly
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, I really believe in Casein as a bedtime supplement especially on workout days. I've seen results and this has other things you need to process the proteins. It’s slow digesting so instead of burning muscle while you sleep it helps repair your muscle. What people don’t know is a lot of the muscle repair and muscle growth is done when sleeping. It works for me. A little hard to mix, put water in your shaker first then ad the scoop it makes a huge difference .
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: THICK!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vanilla. First thing I noticed is that there was no scoop!? So I looked at the serving suggestion thinking I had to use tablespoons, but behold it said "scoop." So, I grabbed a scoop from another protein powder I already had and used that. Maybe it was a bit too big because man is this stuff thick! I mean, burn out the motor on my mini shake blender thick...even with water! It clumps easily so you might want to stir it up before blending. Tastes good though.
customer_reviews.author: RDD66

customer_reviews.title: The vanilla flavor is very bad.
customer_reviews.text: I love all Optimum Nutrition and I’ve been drinking their whey protein for years. And while I’m fully aware that casein powder isn’t as palatable as whey I must advise against buying their Vanilla flavor of casein protein. I made the mistake of purchasing a 5lb tub of it about 8 months ago and it’s been difficult to finish because of how bad it tastes. I’ve tried mixing it with water/cows milk/almond milk/ coconut milk etc and it’s always bad. The chemical taste is too strong to mask. I have purchased the chocolate version and it’s definitely nowhere near as bad as vanilla so I finished that tub much sooner. It’s disappointing because it was a big expense.
customer_reviews.author: JennyG

customer_reviews.title: Tastes ok but Doesn’t mix well
customer_reviews.text: Couple things that make me cringe - 1. Upon delivery the scoop is not found on the top of the jar or in the top layers. It was pretty much all the way down. The scoop should be attached to the lid. 2. Mixing it up is messy. It sticks everywhere on the blender/spoon / glass. I ordered the chocolate and I have no complaints about the taste.
customer_reviews.author: PALS

customer_reviews.title: 100% Gold Standard Casein ON
customer_reviews.text: I started taking the ON casein cookies & creme about 2 months ago. I drink 14-16 oz cup before going to bed. I add 1/3 cup of frozen blueberries & 12 oz of Almond milk. I keep it inside the refrigerator for 2 hrs to get cold for better taste and comes out good just like a milk shake. I avoid adding bananas because comes out tasting like a thick smoothie. Since the time I started taking the ON casein I've notice my body more define than before. I take it when I workout & days I don't. I will definitely continue buying the ON casein from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Great results, try it with blended frozen fruit. 😋
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the taste of it, mixed with almond milk and frozen fruit. I am using for recovery and taking it at night. So far so good, I feel like I am recovering faster and faster day by day. I will mention one thing, it says it won't constipate, but keep in mind if you don't hydrate, you will be constipated. I know, TMI but wanted to warn. Great product, I'm happy so far!! Couple weeks in now.
customer_reviews.author: moran31

customer_reviews.title: Terrific flavor, great way to fill in my macro gaps if I'm short on protein that day
customer_reviews.text: What I love about casein protein is it keeps you full and absorbs slower than whey. I usually drink it before I go to bed, and it's so thick it's like drinking a shake, even when blended with just water. Makes me sleepy for bed, too . And since I like to keep track of my macros, this is a great way to add some extra protein if you realize you're falling short. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used Gold Standard Whey for a while, and decided to try Casein. It seems these flavors are inherently not as tasty as whey, but still very good. They are much thicker, requiring more water. They are surprisingly satisfying and satiating. I haven't tried any bad flavors of this, but would say Chocolate Peanut Butter and Cookie Dough are my two favorites. Banana Cream was probably the weakest of the ones I tried.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Delicious...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the 100% whey ON vanilla but needed a slower digesting protein. The whey/casein blend is so, so, so delicious. Blends great, quick dissolve, and I can tell it helps me to feel more satiated before bedtime. DEFINITELY much tastier than the 100% whey, DEFINITELY will be purchasing this from now on. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My husband really loves this company and protein powder brand. This one I got for him to help him feel fuller because he’s an over eater and this seems to work. It’s also great for his working out so very please as always with Optimum nutrition. The taste is really good my husband said and it blends very well since I am the protein shake maker of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Aliye Reichard Wayit

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder my legs recuperate sooner when I drink it at night after a leg workout. Makes excellent protein pancakes.: Two scoops of protein powder to eggs one teaspoon of baking powder and a little bit of water maybe 2 to 6 tablespoons.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Although I love the other products from ON, I did not like this one
customer_reviews.text: I typically use the ON GS Mocha Cappuccino, however, it kept me up at night due to caffeine, I love it though. So, I ordered this as it seemed to have slow digestion and whole nine yards......This stuff does not blend right at all, when using a shaker bottle, every time it leaves thick lumps that feel like you are swallowing pieces of meat. When blending, you have to use a large quantity of beverage, as it comes out very very thick. Overall, it was a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mohammed r ahmed

customer_reviews.title: If you like to eat chalk then THIS IS FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: The most terrible thing I ever tasted. Read so many reviews on how good it taste blah blah blah. You must like eating chalk if you think this taste good. It’s terrible! You open the can and it just has a STANK! As soon as I tasted it I quickly contacted amazon to return it back. I wouldn’t even take this stuff if they gave it to me for FREE!!!!! Highly recommend you to buy good quality product like Dymatize ISO100 the new Cocoa pebbles is beyond amazing! I’ve tasted the peanut butter iso100 and it’s so good! STAY AWAY FROM THIS GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.author: Geneva C.

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Isn't Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ON whey/casein for years, and I think they make a quality product. By nature, casein isn't going to mix as well and tends to not taste as good. The Gold Standard chocolate tastes a lot better than the casein chocolate, for example, but that's the nature of the beast. However, I must say that I did not like the peanut butter flavor at all. It had a weird aftertaste that I couldn't stomach. I'm still a fan of the brand, just not this flavor. I'll try a few more. 3 years of all chocolate is too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Blends better with 32oz bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great bulk buy for Casein. I've got a 16oz blender bottle and the suggested serving size doesn't mix well with the maximum amount of water you can blend with it in that size bottle. It would definitely blend better with a 32oz bottle though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: doesn't taste like ON whey chocolate peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't taste as good as the ON Whey Chocolate Peanut Butter version but it's drinkable. You don't really taste the flavor in this it's similar to watery cake mix. I just started taking this in hopes to see better gains from my workouts. Label states to drink this before bedtime, the first night I was ok, the 2nd and 3rd night it kept me up because my stomach was processing the protein. I tossed and turned all night. The 4th night seemed to return to normal, we'll see how this continues.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Night time shake
customer_reviews.text: Probably thee BEST protein out there. For those in the weight room regularly with a good diet this , for me, is a night time protein. I try to eat every 2-2.5 hours. So I have one ready for when I get up in middle of the night. What a slow digesting protein is for. Yes you can have a regular shake immediately after a workout, however in my opinion that’s when a solid meal is necessary. I like having a jug of the Casein when I’m in the weight room regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived, there was a plastic wrap around the lid, but no airtight seal under the lid like most powder products. This caused the protein to spill out of the container in transit. Its seems that I lost about 2 servings, and it made a mess of my kitchen upon opening the box. Negatives aside, the flavor is good, and it mixes pretty well (as well as most caseins).
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Makes great protein frosting, not so much 'icecream'.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could try the whole "use half the amount of milk/water and throw in the freezer to make icecream" thing. I did exactly that and before putting it in the fridge it was basically frosting. This would work great for frosting some protein cookies, no doubt about that. After the freezer it was pretty much just like frozen frosting instead of the icecream I was hoping to be eating before bed every night. Since I'm not a fan of frosting, I have been drinking it like a regular casein protein shake before bed and the cookies and cream option is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the vanilla; taste like air freshener coconut 😲
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the vanilla yet it tasted like fake air freshener coconut. It did fill me up though. Ended up with the chocolate and it's much better. Don't try to mix with a shaker cup because you'll end up with clumps. The only way I got a smooth result was my ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle V

customer_reviews.title: Great great great
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite tasting protein powders. Great thickness and adds wonderful flavor to my smoothies. Tried others but this one is my go to
customer_reviews.author: SoCalBuyer154

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other brands
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because i read that casein is good before bed and i can tell you this stuff makes a thick shake, it does not blend as well as other products and the flavor is just bleh. i would probably not recommend this product to be completely honest.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Not the best taste or texture
customer_reviews.text: Not the best taste in the world. I thought you couldn't go wrong with chocolate and peanut butter... but I was wrong. At least it doesn't leave a weird aftertaste in your mouth! I would maybe consider trying it again in another flavor, but for now I will go back to what I was using before. Glad I tried it so I know to be wary of "fun" flavors in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Emma D.

customer_reviews.title: mixes super easy. tastes and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Okay it stirred incredibly easy and almost tastes like a warm chocolate malt. it is thick at 1 cup of milk but a cup and a half seems to be perfect. tastes really good and maybe im wierd but i love the smell of it. will definitely buy this again! just wow! i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it has really helped with my workouts. I began lifting weights again after 10+ years of not lifting weights and I've noticed a difference in my recovery after workouts when I do take it vs. when I have forgotten to take it a couple of times. Ordered the Vanilla flavor and read some reviews that it tasted awful but it tastes absolutely fine to me. I'll be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: dmg987987

customer_reviews.title: Less plastic please
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it tastes good. I’d like a non-plastic option for reorder. I'm starting to accumulate plastic protein canisters and it would be great to be able to reuse what I have and be part of the less plastic production solution. I would imagine the cost of product packaging would also be beneficial. Also, it’s sold by weight and therefore it’s only half-full.
customer_reviews.author: CAZADOR

customer_reviews.title: Yuck yuck yuck
customer_reviews.text: 😩🤭😷 I’m sorry but this is the worst tasting casein id have. It was so thick, even if I added way more liquid than the instructions required and the vanilla flavor was so “plasticky” I had to use a lot of will power to use this. 3 stars because I guess the ingredients are high quality
customer_reviews.author: Adam  Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, No Clumps
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this protein for years. I’ve tried probably around 9 or 10 different brands but nothing can compare to the taste. They did tweak their flavor not too long ago but my opinion remains the same. It dissolves very easily and I never experience clumping which can be an issue with cheaper proteins.
customer_reviews.author: FiveSky

customer_reviews.title: Lacked flavor, wouldn’t suggest
customer_reviews.text: This is my first casein so I’m not sure if they are all like this but I do not like the taste of the cookies and cream. I have loved my whey isolate powders and they are like a dessert to me. Maybe it’s just casein that is not very good...but this one was not for me. It lacked flavor and was very thick and almost chalky.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: great tasting protein!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love all of ON supplements. The casein (once you blend thoroughly) is super yummy. Creamy. Not like whey at all. I utilize this as part of my diet in the evenings before bed. Love both the vanilla and the strawberry! (Havent tried the chocolate yet... but i am sure it is good!)
customer_reviews.author: SaxofonGal

customer_reviews.title: #1 Casein on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of ON products since 2011 when they were the leading protein powder on the market. Since then, their whey has fallen off of the map, there are much better products. As far as their Casein is concerned though, I love it. Its perfect for night time to quiet hunger pangs, the stats are on point and the sugar content is low. I would recommend ON Casein if you like a thick and flavorful shake.
customer_reviews.author: anthony morrone

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good but must be blended
customer_reviews.text: The powder does not blend in the water when you use a manual protein shaker. It is very powdery. I only use it on my husband's fruit blended protein shake. Drinking it from a protein bottle is just not convenient. Chunks don't disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Yb

customer_reviews.title: Standard is standard
customer_reviews.text: ON is an industry standard for good reason. What can I say. The taste is great as well as the quality. Doesn't stir well, but shakes okay. It thickens quite a bit. My first Casein. May be the nature of it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE FLAVOR WARNING!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE FLAVOR WARNING!! The cookie dough flavor is awful. It tastes like currry. If you love curry, this is for you. If not, don’t order this one and stick to the chocolate peanut butter flavor. I’ve never tasted something so awful!
customer_reviews.author: jerseygirl

customer_reviews.title: Cookies and cream is the best tasting flavor I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Cookies and cream is the best tasting flavor I've tried. I like to use half a glass of skim milk, fill the rest with water, then add casein. I keep my glasses in the freezer too so it's ice cold when I drink it. Great flavor. I look forward to drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best casein whey for price and ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Best casein whey for price and ingredients. Good flavor but not as great at the whey isolate options which is my only conplaint. Great for before bed to build/repair muscle and supress appetite to avoid eating a block of cheese at midnight.
customer_reviews.author: McCaulsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Macros, taste is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I've had better tasting protein powders, but as far as Casein protein powder goes, this is right up there flavor-wise. Great macros as well. Would recommend. The chocolate is better than the vanilla IMO for this brand of Casein.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brooks

customer_reviews.title: What is the serving size?
customer_reviews.text: It will take some time to gauge its efficacy . Mine didn't come with a scoop. Does anyone know how many cups is in a heaping scoop? Update: ON has responded to my request immediately. Thank you, ON. For those interested, they tell me their scoop is 1/4 cup or 4 tbsp. Adding a star.
customer_reviews.author: For the horses - Φίλιππος

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good does what it says
customer_reviews.text: So I used to never use stuff like this I would just suffer. My friend got me to buy some and to be honest I can work out more frequently now and the after workout pain is gone for the most part I would recommend this. Also it does taste good if you mix it in milk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Quality is decent, packaging- not so much!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is pretty good, though not as good as some chocolate whey. The first time I ordered this, the packaging was fine. The second time I received it, the lid was halfway off. If I hadn't already run out, I would've sent it back for a new one, so that's on me for being impatient.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Daily Must Add!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my coffee in the morning and feel like I already have a meal to go. The blending is a little rough though maybe blend beforehand or really thoroughly shake it but adding the vanilla flavor to coffee gives a strong hazelnut taste that is amazing. I feel this is a good addition to a morning drink to help get your daily protein intake up.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Sebastian Szenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for baking
customer_reviews.text: The Casein protein powder is great when you want to bake and limit carbs. I like this for making healthy brownies. I wish these companies would come out with recipes - for cakes, brownies, pancakes, etc. Awesome product. Also like casein protein because it keeps you full longer as it is slower to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and works.
customer_reviews.text: I live the taste of the chocolate and it really does help keep me full all morning. I drink a shake for breakfast along with a banana and I’ll good until lunch and sometimes even longer.
customer_reviews.author: dru1313

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and mixes really well
customer_reviews.text: I love this creamy vanilla casein protein. Surprising the taste is incredible and there is basically no sugar in the product. I use this product as a meal replacement because the casein is a slow acting protein and holds me over for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Muscles strong
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying casein. The taste is good. I use a blender and have had no trouble with clumping using two cups of liquid. I haven't tried just using one. I drink it at night and it digests fine so I have no trouble sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: thick and clumpy with milk, so I typically blend it with a thinner shake.  Taste (vanilla) is good
customer_reviews.text: mixes very thick and clumpy with milk, so I typically blend it with a thinner shake. Taste (vanilla) is good. Digestion-gurgle-factor is a bit higher than my typical reaction to Whey-based protein shake., but it is not upsetting. A good option for a slower-digesting protein, good for low-carb.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, keeps me full all night.
customer_reviews.text: I drink a shake almost every night before bed and do not wake up hungry in the morning. The flavor is great. It works well with both milk, or water. I would recommend drinking it right away or the shake gets very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying ON Whey powder for awhile now, i usually get the gourmet chocolate flavor. I have been trying to gain muscle so my friend recommended this casein protein, can someone please tell me why this tastes so much better than the normal whey protein!? it is a lot richer, its like having a dessert!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Bainbridge

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cookies and cream and I can barely stomach the taste as the flavor is not good and it blends into a slimy chunky mess. It does, however, keep me feeling full for 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Octavia Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great for a late night shake when bulking.
customer_reviews.text: Still giving this a 5 star review as I knew going in it would be a little hard to mix and taste a little funny... basically take you favorite food and make it the "diet version" and that's how this taste a little off and not concentrated. Over all its manageable, and helps me as a late night shake to help put on weight/bulk. If you shake it hard in a good blender bottle it will work other than that you need some sort of blender.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great, Kills Appetite
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not expect it to taste this good. I used a GNC product before and it is not as nearly as good as this one. A shaker cup is NEEDED. Preferably the one with the metal whisk inside of it. With the shaker cup and 12 oz of milk is works perfectly! It might seem pricey but it’s around $50 for 55 serving which is around a buck per shake not including the milk. In reality it’s a great bang for your buck since buying these shakes at your local gym could run you around 9 bucks. Cookies n’ Cream is great, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ramez Daruvala

customer_reviews.title: Not losing weight anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Believe me when I say after taking this product every night before sleeping, I don't lose any weight no more. This product is fantastic for people who doesn't want to lose muscle mass and are trying to gain weight. Keep in mind, this does make you feel full, so take it before sleep, and i feel this also helps with muscle recovery. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Sahil

customer_reviews.title: Works great in smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in smoothies. I use about 1 container per month. Quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. White

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t taste like before, stomach feels weird after
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for past few years and typically they’ve gone and updated it and it tastes different now and has upset my stomach which has never happened before. I literally had it daily for the last few years. Will look to a different brand after I use this up. Disappointing. Why do they change the things that are already good?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: Only casein protein I’ve tried so can’t compare it to others but I drink it before going to bed. Keeps me full throughout the night and ready for my workout in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Shahnawaz Hossain

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, keeps you full!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stuff. It definitely is thick, taste like a frosty if you add ice. I'm lactose intolerant, so I was worried this would affect me, but so far I've been okay. I've used at bedtime and in the morning, it definitely helps keep me full and curb my appetite for hours after.
customer_reviews.author: jostaze

customer_reviews.title: Kept me full during the night.
customer_reviews.text: Kept me nice and full throughout the night I didn’t wake up with those late night jitters. It tasted pretty good just make sure you blend it good. It’s a yes from me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blend well
customer_reviews.text: This taste pretty good, but doesn't blend very well. I have tried many different ways to help the blending process with no luck. I really like ON products, but I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: It has a great taste to it which is a plus because protein powders with higher amounts of protein in it have such an awful chalky taste. This tastes great and fits amazingly in my daily calorie intake for carbs, protein, fat and sugar.
customer_reviews.author: SSeales

customer_reviews.title: Great casein. Drink it before going to bed
customer_reviews.text: You want to drink this casein protein before going to bed. This protein it is made for your body to process it slowly, so it will keep your body satisfied while you sleep. Flavor and quality are great. I recommend you mix it inside a blender not a shaker bottle.
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Superior protein!
customer_reviews.text: The best protein I’ve ever had in terms of taste, texture, blending, and quality. This protein helps me recover significantly quicker and keeps me full making for a great meal replacement. I blend a scoop with 8oz vanilla unsweetened almond milk and 16oz water
customer_reviews.author: talowry

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and better for sleep than optimum nutrition whey.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great. It almost has a hint of coffee flavor. The cookie chunks don't dissolve, but I like the bits. It seems to make me sleepy.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingaddiction

customer_reviews.title: First time buying protein powder--not bad!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I'm very new to the protein powder world, so take my review for what it's worth. The flavor (cookies and cream) is great, definitely more drinkable than I expected. I use 12oz almond milk, a cap of miralax, and a scoop of the powder and SHAKE IT FOR ALL IT IS WORTH! I drink one as a breakfast supplement then one in the evening to keep me full throughout the night. There are usually still some tiny chunks in it, but not enough to discourage me from continuing to drink it. Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Pepto Bismol
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the chocolate flavored ON casein and it was great. Decided to try Strawberry Cream for something different, knowing that flavor is good in other protein powders I've tried. I was wrong. This stuff tastes like a mix of pepto bismol and amoxcicilin. Made with milk or water, doesn't make a difference. I'll choke it down every night to get through it but will definitely switch back to Chocolate as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My husband drinks this every night before bed and it is helping with his recovery and helping him to keep the muscle he has and bulk a little and define as well. I highly suggest this to anyone who is a body builder to add to their list of supplements to be taking. If you want to blend it the best way we use our ninja but for lazy nights just shaker bottle and my husband still drinks it. I mean it is very thick but who cares when you are seeing results.
customer_reviews.author: Arleigh Turley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things about Optimum it’s the flavor, but this one doesn’t taste really good and the blending power isn’t good, I feel like if I’m drinking powder
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Felix

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and is perfect for over night so you don’t wake up hungry. You can retain more muscle since you have slow metabolizing food in your tummy over the night.
customer_reviews.author: LaertisGR

customer_reviews.title: The flavor tastes great. Based off the purpose of this product it ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking Casein a week ago. Trying to grow muscle so based off research I have done, I take a scoop in the evening prior to going to bed. I mix it with milk, it's really thick, so perhaps I should try mixing it with water to make it a little more viscous. The flavor tastes great. Based off the purpose of this product it will take a few months before I notice the difference between taking it along with Whey, versus just whey protein alone.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Sigunga

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor. Thick.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes amazing. Look forward to it each night as a dessert. Super thick compared to Whey. Needs more liquid to mix
customer_reviews.author: john schneider

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first encounter with this product and this supplier. It arrived on time, the package was in perfect condition and the product was sealed. I purchased the Creamy Vanilla to mix with(Vanilla Creme flavor) so that I would have the quicker digesting Whey protein as well as the slower digesting Casein protein. Together they have a great taste and the key to getting rid of the (naturally occurring) clumps is how it's mixed. I use either a hand-held mixer or a more convenient shaker bottle such asthat includes an internal screen for breaking up clumps. I would definately purchase this product again from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I use this if I have a early/light dinner and around bed time I get hungry or crave something sweet. I mix with almond milk and don’t wake up starving like I usually do. Sometimes I use a half of scoop of Casin and half a scoop of protein powder after a workout if I’m short on time. No complaints and I will purchase again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Caesine? YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: I feel really bad writing a bad review for this because I’m sure it has great health benefits, but its just too nasty for me to find out! I got the vanilla flavor and it looks and tastes like an infants spit up! I just couldn’t do it man... not for the gains, not for anything. So you do you I’m sure its good for you, but if you don’t like things that taste terrible, then this ain’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product, not so great taste
customer_reviews.text: This type of protein isn't normally used the same way that whey protein is used, so I wouldn't reccomend it as an everyday use. It's slow acting, so its better used as a nightime snack to help rebuild your muscle fibers during sleep. It's alot thicker than whey proteins, and when mixed with water it has a significant chalky flavor where most proteins usually have a very slight flavor if at all. It is great when mixed in a blender with milk/ yogurt and some ice. It won't hurt to add a little chocolate syrup or a spoonful of peanut butter for some flavor. Overall GREAT product made by a trusted company, but don't buy it for taste alone.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Gold Standard 100% Micellar Casein Protein Powder, Slow Digesting, Helps Keep You Full, Overnight Muscle Recovery, Chocolate Supreme, 4 Pound (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Supreme| Size:4 PoundFaster digesting protein is desirable immediately before and after exercise to help refuel recovering muscles, but slow digestion and absorption may be more beneficial at other times including bedtime when your body typically goes for hours without food. Casein products are acid sensitive and thicken in the stomach. Compared to some other proteins, it can take longer for our GOLD STANDARD 100% Casein to be broken down into its amino acid subcomponents. By using only premium micellar casein as a protein source, we've created a formula that sets the standard for slow digesting protein support.
feature_bullets: PACKAGING MAY VARY - New look, with the same trusted Quality!
SLOW DIGESTING – a great option between meals or at bed-time to support muscle recovery overnight
MICELLAR CASEIN – 24g of a high-quality, slow-digesting, anti-catabolic protein to help support the recovery process and achieve your health and fitness goals
SATIETY – helps you feel full and support your weight management goals
AVAILABLE IN 2 SIZES – 2 and 4 lb. tubs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
